entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:02:18
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Microsoft jumps while Google owner Alphabet slips as Wall Street zeroes in on the tech giants' AI efforts
- FTX is considering 3 bids to restart the crypto exchange, report says
- 'Spider-Man 2' reveals Peter Parker's mortgage rate, so I asked brokers if he got a good deal in the new PS5 game
- Here's what reportedly led to Cruise robotaxis getting banned in San Francisco
- Microsoft Announces Radius: a New Open Application Platform for the Cloud
- Node.js 21 Release Updates V8 Engine, WebSteams Module and Test Runner
- Node.js Worker Threads Vs. Child Processes: Which one should you use?
- How to Build and Deploy an API-Driven Streamlit/Python Microservice on AWS
- Google DeepMind Proposes An Artificial Intelligence Framework for Social and Ethical AI Risk Assessment

Business:
- Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Is Investigating Wiley, and R1 RCM and ... - StreetInsider.com
- Californians are fleeing amid sky-high housing costs. Here are the top 10 states they're flocking to.
- Warren Buffett is set to indirectly bet on a tiny nation that's the world's fastest-growing economy and an emerging oil superpower
- The Cost Of Manual Sales Order Management Workflows And The Benefits Of Automation

AI:
- Microsoft jumps while Google owner Alphabet slips as Wall Street zeroes in on the tech giants' AI efforts
- Google DeepMind Proposes An Artificial Intelligence Framework for Social and Ethical AI Risk Assessment

Insights:
- The tech giants, Microsoft and Google, are both making moves in the AI space, with Microsoft gaining traction and Google facing challenges.
- The crypto exchange FTX is considering bids to restart its operations, indicating continued interest and investment in the cryptocurrency market.
- The banning of Cruise robotaxis in San Francisco highlights the regulatory challenges faced by autonomous vehicle companies.
- The announcement of Microsoft's Radius platform showcases the company's commitment to cloud computing and application development.
- The updates to Node.js and the comparison between worker threads and child processes provide insights into the development and optimization of JavaScript applications.
- Google DeepMind's proposal for an AI risk assessment framework demonstrates the growing importance of ethical considerations in AI development.
- The migration of Californians to other states due to high housing costs reflects the impact of affordability on population movements.
- Warren Buffett's indirect bet on a fast-growing economy and emerging oil superpower suggests his confidence in long-term economic growth.
- The benefits of automation in sales order management workflows highlight the potential for increased efficiency and cost savings in business operations.
